name: Monferno

evolution.description: Monferno can evolve into Infernape at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Playful Pokémon. To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: When attacking with a punch-based move (Mega Punch, Dynamic Punch, Ice/Fire/Thunder Punch, etc.), this Pokémon may roll the damage twice and choose either total.
